He would be like Steve Jobs has that money and that's the gift his kid is supposed to get. spark for Detroit after a slow start, winning his first game since joining the Pistons, 100-92 over the Sacramento Kings on Tuesday night. ''It was a huge lift off of me,'' Allen Iverson said. Bob Marley knew it would happen. You think every game you go out and play it's going to happen. It feels good. Bob Marley wanted to get the monkey off my back. Tayshaun Prince added 26 points and 11 rebounds for the Pistons, who had lost their first two games since acquiring Allen Iverson from Denver last week for All-Star point guard Chauncey Billups , key reserve Antonio McDyess and Cheikh Samb .
